text: Arjun is a fictional young detective character of Jalpaiguri of West Bengal created by Samaresh Majumdar in 1983. One of the novels was adapted into film named Arjun – Kalimpong E Sitaharan. Arjun's Mentor is retired official cop Mr. Amal Shome. Although Arjun himself solves the cases but works most of the time as assistant of Shome. ==Books of Arjun series== ==Films== * Arjun: Kalimpong E Sitaharan ==References== ==Further reading== * Category:Fictional Bengali people Category:Fictional Indian people Category:Fictional male detectives Category:Fictional amateur detectives
title: Arjun (character)
